title: Drawing, "Galloping Horse Design (Black & White), Textile Design", 1950–70
medium: Brush and gouache, graphite on paper, lined
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, lower right: "smaller horse/tailored/repeat" ;  lines forming squares underneath.
description: Pattern of galloping white horses on a black background.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Galloping Horse Design (Black & White), Textile Design", 1950–70.
1950–70. Brush and gouache, graphite on paper, lined. Gift of Mr. Donald Cameron. 1992-51-4.
